about:
Greetings! I'm Hastings Tugume, a junior software engineer passionate about crafting efficient systems. My journey began at Makerere University, where I earned a Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering, fostering a deep interest in Java's capabilities. 

 At Pahappa Limited, I contributed to a groundbreaking content generation system using React and Spring MVC, integrating seamlessly into African businesses. As an ICT Intern at the Parliament of Uganda, I optimized internal networks, ensuring streamlined operations. 

 My diverse projects, from aiding the visually impaired with an Android app to implementing a Java-based Point of Sale system, highlight my commitment to innovation and efficiency. Proficient in Java, JavaScript, React, and more, I'm driven to push software engineering boundaries and embrace challenges that foster growth and innovation.
